item.title: teaching
item.description: 14-15 Aug 2019 - Software Carpentry at University of California Los Angeles, website 09-10 Sep 2017 - Software Carpentry at Utah State University, website 14-15 Aug 2017 - Software Carpentry at University of Delaware,website 18-19 May 2017 - Software Carpentry at University of Arkansas, website 22-23 Aug 2016 - Software Carpentry at Johns Hopkins University, website

item.title: about
item.description: Hello! I’m currently a data scientist at YieldMo working on a broad set of problem in digital advertising and using ML/AI to address them. Previously, I worked at VideoAmp on cross-screen planning and measurement of TV viewership and advertisement. And before that, I was a Data Science Fellow at Insight Data Science during Spring 2018 and have been an instructor at Software Carpentry since 2016. I received my Ph.D. in physics from ASU working with Mike Thorpe.
